title: Emerald Bloom Jhumka: A Touch of Tradition
materials: Base metal with gold finish; Pearly white synthetic pearls; emerald green synthetic stone; Cubic Zirconia (CZ)
features: Tiered floral design cascading down from an emerald-like stone. Embellished with Cubic Zirconia stones with white pears.
description: This is a contemporary take on a classic design, made with high quality materials and an eye for detail. Durable and easy to maintain, these earrings will make a statement without overpowering your look.
